"""
I notice the drill's drop position is at (20.296875, -17.49609375) but we're placing things too far away. Let's try placing the belt and inserter at the exact positions needed:
"""

# Get reference entities
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0]

print(f"Starting setup:")
print(f"Drill at {drill.position} with drop at {drill.drop_position}")
print(f"Furnace at {furnace.position}")

# Place belt exactly at drill's drop position
move_to(drill.drop_position)
belt = place_entity(
    Prototype.TransportBelt,
    position=Position(
        x=drill.drop_position.x,
        y=drill.drop_position.y
    ),
    direction=Direction.RIGHT
)
print(f"Placed belt at drill's drop position: {belt.position}")

# Calculate inserter position between belt and furnace
inserter_pos = Position(
    x=furnace.position.x - 0.5,  # Half a tile left of furnace
    y=furnace.position.y         # Same Y as furnace
)
move_to(inserter_pos)
inserter = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    position=inserter_pos,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT  # Face towards furnace
)
print(f"Placed inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Add fuel to both machines
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=1)
if not drill.fuel:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=1)
print("Added fuel to machines")

# Debug final setup
print(f"Final positions:")
print(f"Belt input/output: {belt.input_position}, {belt.output_position}")
print(f"Inserter pickup/drop: {inserter.pickup_position}, {inserter.drop_position}")

# Check all entity states
print(f"Status check:")
print(f"Drill status: {drill.status}")
print(f"Belt status: {belt.status}")
print(f"Inserter status: {inserter.status}")
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace.status}")
